ModMetaData.name: Facial Animation Eye Fix
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
本模组用来修复面部表情模组有时候会出现的“黑眼圈”BUG。原理大致是游戏开始的时候，模拟点击了（直接调用相关函数）模组选项，面部表情模组里的"Re-draw Render Textures"按钮。
This mod is to fix the "black layering around eyes bug" for facial animation mod. The principle is to simulate the clicking on the "Re-draw Render Textures" button (by direct function call) in the facial animation mod settings when the game starts.
